bar.character-count-description: Number of characters to display from virtual desktop names (1-10).
bar.enable-scrollwheel-description: Switch between virtual desktops using the mouse scroll wheel.
bar.follow-focused-screen-description: Display virtual desktops from the currently focused screen, rather than the screen where the bar is located.
bar.grouped-border-opacity-description: Set the opacity level for virtual desktop container borders.
bar.hide-unpopulated-description: Don't display virtual desktops without windows.
bar.label-mode-description: Choose how virtual desktop labels are displayed.
bar.show-applications-description: Display application icons inside each virtual desktop.
bar.show-labels-only-when-populated-descript: Only show virtual desktop labels when they contain windows.
bar.unfocused-icons-opacity-description: Set the opacity level for unfocused app icons.
